Levels
======

    {width, height} = require "./pixie"

    {defaults, extend} = require "util"

    Line = require "./lib/line"

    bg = (name, options={}) ->
      engine.add "Background", extend
        x: width
        y: height
        spriteName: name
        scale: 1
        zIndex: -1000
      , options

    line = (data) ->
      Line
        start: Point data.start
        end: Point data.end

    lines = (lines) ->
      engine.add "Wall",
        lines: lines.map line

    module.exports = [
      # 0
      ->
        bg "sandcastles",
          scale: 2
